titleStmt.title: The Irish-evidence convicted by their own oaths, or, Their swearing and counter-swearing plainly demonstrated in several of their own affidavits herewith faithfully published as also a full and impartial account of their past & present practices.
titleStmt.author: Hetherington, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Inghal the Elder,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Hetherington. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Item at reel 459:3 identified as Wing I1038 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
